mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Datebook", "On the Record", "As I See It", "Mark of a Professional by Lee Helsel", "Gold Ribbon Report Caller-leadership", "Feedback", "DIALOG: Caller-leadership", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Madeline Allen's Column", "The National Convention", "Square Dance Vacations", "The Caller and His Income Tax", "Style Lab: Names", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "S.I.O. Workshop", "Paging the Round Dancers: Jack & Margery Vanstone", "Current Best Sellers", and "Feature Fashion".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
